data.what_is:
You can build and run your entire retention marketing program in one place with ShopAgain's all-in-one platform. 

Email Marketing 
SMS Marketing 
Whatsapp Marketing 
Popups & Forms 
AI-powered Product Recommendation 
Cross-sell & Upsell Facebook & Google Audience Sync 

Creating a personalized shopping experience for your customers is difficult and time-consuming. ShopAgain's AI technology learns from your customers' browsing, purchase, and demographic data. The platform automatically creates customer segments, advanced drip campaigns, and product recommendations personalized for your store.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great marketing tool at very fair price with superb support!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ShopAgain?
I own a WooCommerce business. I love the ability to built campaign flows in so many ways, pulling in customer data and history is wonderful but even better than that is the personal support from their team to save me time with the learning curve. Instead of just directing me to videos to watch and directions to read, (which I don't have the time for) there is a willingness to jump into a zoom meeting and show me things.

What do you dislike about ShopAgain?
Nothing I dislike. Am hoping for a two step signup to capture phone# for SMS and the email which they tell me they are working on.

What problems is ShopAgain solving and how is that benefiting you?
ShopAgain set up my flows for my Pop Up Welcome discount and Cart Abandonment for me saving me so much time and resulting in conversions. I have wanted to use an email marketing service that would offer a more personal service and help me set things up the way I wanted and they have saved me so much time and headache. Great company with excellent support and service.

initial_reviews.review_title: ShopAgain is the new, best email provider for Shopify Users.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ShopAgain?
ShopAgain is a one-stop shop for SMS, email, pop ups and a really amazing dashboard.

What do you dislike about ShopAgain?
Only that it's new. Once word gets out about this software, I might not get all the personal attention I'm personally getting. But it'll be worth it. I want them to grow. They've been a game changer for me.

What problems is ShopAgain solving and how is that benefiting you?
I used to love Active Campaign. No longer useful for my Shopify e-commerce site. This is far, far better, more robust, and easier to navigate and set up. I love that it replaces at least 3 of my Shopify apps, so this means I don't have to have Shopify apps working against each other, something I've had to deal with over and over again.
